scripts.clean: npx rimraf dist misc/manifest.d.ts misc/manifest.d.ts.map misc/manifest.js misc/manifest.js.map misc/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.start: tsc -b misc && node misc/manifest.js && parcel watch src/manifest.json --host localhost --port 3500
scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc -b misc && node misc/manifest.js && parcel build src/manifest.json --no-content-hash --no-cache --no-source-maps --detailed-report 0
